text: Haqeeqat yeh hai ke Allah ne momino se unke nafs (jaan) aur unke maal jannat ke badle khareed liye hain, woh Allah ki raah mein ladte aur maarte aur marte hain. Unse (jannat ka wada) Allah ke zimme ek pukhta wada hai taurat (torah) aur injil aur quran mein. Aur kaun hai jo Allah se badhkar apne ahad ka pura karne wala ho? Pas khushiyan manao apne us saude (deal) par jo tumne khuda se chuka liya hai, yahi sabse badi kamiyabi hai
